original_title: Oingo Boingo: Live At The Ritz
overview: Recorded on April 25th, 1987 at The Ritz in New York City.  Dead Man's Party  Play Video  Who Do You Want To Be?  Play Video  Just Another Day  Play Video  Grey Matter  Play Video  Stay  Play Video  Weird Science  Play Video  Goodbye Goodbye
title: Oingo Boingo: Live At The Ritz
